00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <hdf.h>
00020 #include <mfhdf.h>
00021 
00035 MTKt_status MtkFileToOrbit( const char *filename, 
00036                int *orbit             )
00037 {
00038   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00039   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00040   int32 hdf_status;        /* HDF-EOS return status */
00041   int32 sd_id = FAIL;      /* HDF SD file identifier. */
00042 
00043   if (filename == NULL)
00044     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00045 
00046   /* Open HDF File */
00047   hdf_status = sd_id = SDstart(filename, DFACC_READ);
00048   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00049     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDSTART_FAILED);
00050 
00051   /* Read orbit number. */
00052   status = MtkFileToOrbitFid(sd_id, orbit);
00053   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00054 
00055   /* Close HDF File */
00056   hdf_status = SDend(sd_id);
00057   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00058     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDEND_FAILED);
00059   sd_id = FAIL;
00060 
00061   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00062 
00063 ERROR_HANDLE:
00064   if (sd_id != FAIL)
00065     SDend(sd_id);
00066 
00067   return status_code;
00068 }
00069 
00075 MTKt_status MtkFileToOrbitFid( int32 sd_id, 
00076                    int *orbit             )
00077 {
00078   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00079   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00080   MtkCoreMetaData metadata = MTK_CORE_METADATA_INIT;
00081                 /* Core metadata structure */
00082 
00083   if (orbit == NULL)
00084     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00085 
00086   status = MtkFileCoreMetaDataGetFid(sd_id, "ORBITNUMBER", &metadata);
00087   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00088 
00089   *orbit = metadata.data.i[0];
00090 
00091   MtkCoreMetaDataFree(&metadata);
00092   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00093 
00094 ERROR_HANDLE:
00095   MtkCoreMetaDataFree(&metadata);
00096   return status_code;
00097 }
